Talked at a Banff conference - Mathematical Challenges in Adaptation of Quantum Chemistry to Quantum Computers.

  • Home
  • Blog
  • Banff conference

05 Sep 2023  1 min read.

I gave a presentation regarding our recent quantum computing research in the Matter Lab at the conference titled ‘Mathematical Challenges in the Adaptation of Quantum Chemistry to Quantum Computers.’ The works I presented include:

  • https://arxiv.org/abs/2302.14811
  • https://arxiv.org/abs/2305.02439
  • https://arxiv.org/abs/2306.11802

The video of my presentation can be accessed at the following link: https://www.birs.ca/events/2023/2-day-workshops/23w2015/videos/watch/202309021411-Nakaji.html.

I had thoughtful discussions and enjoyed the hilarious scenes of Banff.
